title: Alibates Flint Quarries National Monument: Photos & Multimedia
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia                    Antelope Creek Village Virtual Tour   8 Photos  If you can't visit in person, take a few minutes to view the highlights of a hike to the Antelope Creek Village site at Alibates Flint Quarries National Monument.          Take a virtual hike to the Alibates Flint Quarries!   10 Photos  View photos and learn a bit about the resources that enabled cultures to thrive on the southern Great Plains for generations.          2015 Events at Alibates   4 Photos  2015 was the 50th anniversary of the Alibates Flint Quarries National Monument and we hosted a series of fun events.             Landscape Photos   13 Photos  Landscapes of Alibates Flint Quarries National Monument.          Ethnobotany: Edible, Medicinal & Useful Plants   6 Photos  Cultures throughtout history have used native plants for a variety of purposes.
